name: Eva
dialogue: I've been feeling overwhelmed lately. So many people coming to me for advice, it's exhausting.

name: Grace
dialogue: Ah, I understand. Sometimes I feel like my garden needs more attention than I can give, but that doesn't mean it isn't worth tending to.

name: Eva
dialogue: Exactly! I just wish there was a way to spread myself thinner without sacrificing the connections with those people.

name: Grace
dialogue: Maybe you're just being too hard on yourself. We all need help sometimes.

name: Grace
dialogue: Of course! That's what friends are for. So, how's your day been otherwise?

name: Eva
dialogue: It's been okay, I guess. Just busy. You know how it is when life gets hectic.

name: Grace
dialogue: Yes... I do know exactly what you mean. Sometimes I feel like my garden needs a good pruning to get back on track.

name: Eva
dialogue: Ha! Yeah, maybe we all need a little pruning now and then.
